Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier.Document
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A generic document, containing all the information Parser and Trainer need.

        An ArrayList of how many times each word in the document appears.

      • normalizedWordCounts

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> normalizedWordCounts
        An array of normalized word counts. Normalization has two steps: 1. If word count is greater than 4, set normalized word count to 1. Otherwise, set to 0. 2. Multiply normalized word count by the inverse document frequency.

      • classification

        public ACMClass classification
        The classification of the document.
